title: Common Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about CreateDAO.
contactText: Have more questions? Contact our community.

isFree.question: Is it really free?
isFree.answer: Yes! CreateDAO is completely free to use. You only pay the blockchain's network gas fees when deploying your DAO.

isSecure.question: Is the code secure?
isSecure.answer: Our smart contracts have not been audited yet, but audits by leading security firms are planned soon. The code is open source for full transparency in the meantime.

supportedNetworks.question: Which networks are supported?
supportedNetworks.answer: We currently support {{networks}}. More networks are coming soon based on community feedback.

customization.question: Can I customize my DAO?
customization.answer: Not yet, but in the future you'll be able to customize voting periods, proposal thresholds, and other governance parameters to fit your community's needs.
